name: kalaallit nunaat kalaallit pigaat beanie
notes:
i have added an english version also containing a chart, meaning that you only need to download the english version for a full pattern.

the text reads kalaallit nunaat kalaallit pigaat which means greenland belongs to the greenlanders. it is the tagline from the government, naalakkersuisut.

thank you so much for your interest and support, which means a lot in these days of pressure <3


50 g af hver farve er rigeligt til flere huer (isager jensen 
garn)
